Project.Brief history of your project and organi:
Welcome to Move X Health, where our journey began with a vision to revolutionize well-being through the power of movement.

Founded in 2017 with passion and a commitment to personalized fitness, we've evolved into a beacon of health, exercise, and lifestyle integration.In our quest to redefine fitness, Move X Health has become a trailblazer in delivering tailored training programs. Our story is one of dedication, innovation, and a relentless pursuit of holistic wellness. We've grown into a comprehensive platform offering specialized programs in Health Coaching, Weight Loss, Advanced Functional Training, Ageing Health and Fitness, Musculoskeletal Care, Pain Management with Physical Rehab, and Kids Development.

At Move X Health, we're not just a fitness destination; we're a community committed to transforming lives. Join us on this exhilarating journey to discover a healthier, more vibrant you. Embrace the power of movement, and let Move X Health be your guide on the path to wellness.
Project.Describe the data being stored onto File: Sports teaching videos, rehabilitation course videos, student profiles
Project.In which geographies do you plan on maki: Greater China, Asia other than Greater China, North America, South America, Australia (continent)
